original: A security guard watches the entrance. There's no other way out, so you put everything back before leaving.
A security guard watches the entrance, and as you try to stroll by, <<he>> stops you.
"So. I've been keeping an eye on you," <<he>> continues, "I'm letting you go this time, but you're going to be
banned from the premises for a while. Hopefully this will help you learn why you shouldn't steal clothes."
A security guard watches the entrance, but you stroll by without arousing suspicion.
<<link [[Next|Shopping Centre Top]]>><<set $tryOn.autoReset to true>><<endevent>><</link>>
A security guard watches the entrance and spots you. <<He>> says a few words to someone you can't see, then approaches you.
"Sorry, can't let you pass," <<he>> says. "You still have <<if $clothingShop.ban gt 1>><<number $clothingShop.ban>> days<<else>>another day<</if>>
till your ban is lifted."
<<link [[Next|Shopping Centre Top]]>><<endevent>><</link>>
You spot a guard right by the entrance. It doesn't look like you'll be able to sneak past.
<<link [[Next|Shopping Centre Top]]>><</link>>
After making sure that you close the shop's door as quietly as you can, you turn around and are shocked to
find a security guard face to face with you. <<He>> places a hand on your shoulder before you can even think of running.
"What do we have here? A little rat thief, trying to make off with some fine embroidery?" <<he>> says with a
disapproving expression, "I'll be informing the owners of this situation."
<<He>> pulls out <<his>> phone and seems to call the shop owners.
"Aha! So you already have a ban in place," <<he>> continues, "They do have a rather strict banning policy,
so it's going to be a good while before you're going to be able to shop here."
"That should do it," <<he>> continues, "Well. You won't be entering this establishment for quite some time.
Hopefully this will teach you a lesson."
"Now follow me, I'll be escorting you out of here. You're lucky that I don't just take you straight to the pillory."
<<link [[Run|Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Run]]>><</link>><<athleticsdifficulty 500>>
<<link [[Follow the guard|Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow]]>><</link>>

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Run
original: You decide to run and hide.

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Run
original: The security guard attempts to fully grab you, but you're able to avoid <<him>> just enough to get away.

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Run
original: You run to the rooftop with <<him>> shouting in the distance.

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Run
original: <<link [[Roof|Commercial rooftops]]>><<endevent>><</link>>

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Run
original: However, before being able to get past the security guard, <<he>> pulls on you hard enough for you to fall right on your ass.

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Run
original: "You'll regret trying to run from me," <<he>> says with a grin on <<his>> face. "There aren't any cameras here."

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Run
original: <<link [[Next|Clothing Shop Night Guard Molestation]]>><<set $molestationstart to 1>><</link>>

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow
original: <<He>> directs you towards the exit.

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow
original: "You know what?" <<he>> questions, "There aren't any cameras in this spot."

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow
original: You look at <<him>> with a worried expression just before <<he>> grabs hold of you.

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow
original: <<link [[Next|Clothing Shop Night Guard Molestation]]>><<set $molestationstart to 1>><</link>>

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow
original: You walk down the stairs in silence and as you reach the main entrance to the Shopping Centre,

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow
original: the guard opens the door for you.

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow
original: "I hope this is a good lesson for you." <<He>> smiles. "You should look for more honest ways of

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow
original: earning money. Less trouble that way for everyone."

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow
original: <<He>> locks the door as you leave.

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Found Follow

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Molestation Finish
original: You're able to hurt <<him>> enough to get away. <<tearful>> you flee the shop.

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Molestation Finish

passage: Clothing Shop Night Guard Molestation Finish
original: "Well, that was fun," <<he>> says, "But I think it's time for you to leave."
